launcher.title: Config Local
launcher.description: Configuration you want on this device

infohub_configlocal_colour.HERE_YOU_CAN_MODIFY_THE_COLOUR_SCHEMA._K: Here you can modify the colour schema.
infohub_configlocal_colour.THE_TEXT_RENDERER_IS_THE_MOST_IMPORTANT_: The text renderer is the most important renderer of them all
infohub_configlocal_colour.IT_ACTS_AS_THE_GLUE_THAT_COMBINE_TOGETHE: It acts as the glue that combine together all the other rendered pieces
infohub_configlocal_colour.THEN_YOU_AUTOMATICALLY_GET_COLUMNS_THAT_: Then you automatically get columns that your text can flow in.
infohub_configlocal_colour.HIGHLIGHT_PORTIONS_OF_THE_TEXT_LIKE_THIS: Highlight portions of the text like this
infohub_configlocal_colour.AND_YOU_CAN_INCLUDE_OTHER_ELEMENTS_IN_YO: And you can include other elements in your text, for example:
infohub_configlocal_colour.YOU_CAN_ZOOM_THE_VIEW_IN_YOUR_BROWSER._K: You can zoom the view in your browser.
infohub_configlocal_colour.WHEN_YOU_DO_THAT_AND_THE_SPACE_IS_TO_NAR: When you do that and the space is to narrow for the column, then it reduces the number of columns.
infohub_configlocal_colour.YOU_ALWAYS_GET_A_READABLE_VIEW_IN_ALL_ZO: You always get a readable view in all zoom levels.
infohub_configlocal_colour.MY_EXTERNAL_LINK_TO_THE_ABC_CLUB_KEY: My external link to the abc club

infohub_configlocal_font.HERE_YOU_CAN_FINE_TUNE_HOW_ALL_TEXT_SHOU: Here you can fine tune how all text should be displayed
infohub_configlocal_font.HOW_BOLD_DO_YOU_WANT_THE_TEXT._DEFAULT_4: How bold do you want the text. Default 400
infohub_configlocal_font.HOW_LARGE_LETTERS_DO_YOU_WANT._DEFAULT_1: How large letters do you want. Default 16px
infohub_configlocal_font.THE_SPACE_BETWEEN_THE_LETTERS._DEFAULT_0: The space between the letters. Default 0px

infohub_configlocal_image.HERE_YOU_SET_ASSET_LIMITS_AND_INSTRUCT_I: Here you set asset limits and instruct infohub what images you can see on this browser
infohub_configlocal_image.YOU_CAN_PREVENT_ALL_IMAGES_AND_SOUNDS_TO: You can prevent all images and sounds to be downloaded. Save download time and quota
infohub_configlocal_image.MAX_ASSET_SIZE_IN_KILOBYTES_YOU_ALLOW_TO: Max asset size in kilobytes you allow to be downloaded.
infohub_configlocal_image.YOU_CAN_LIMIT_TO_SAVE_DOWNLOAD_SPEED_AND: You can limit to save download speed and quota
infohub_configlocal_image.ASSET_IS_CONSIDERED_FRESH_UNTIL_THIS_MAN: Asset is considered fresh until this many days have passed.
infohub_configlocal_image.THEN_WE_WILL_CONTACT_THE_SERVER_AND_SEE_: Then we will contact the server and see if it has been updated
infohub_configlocal_image.DIFFERENT_BROWSERS_SUPPORT_DIFFERENT_IMA: Different browsers support different image formats.
infohub_configlocal_image.SELECT_THE_IMAGE_TYPES_YOU_CAN_SEE_AND_I: Select the image types you can see and i will avoid downloading images you can not see on this browser

infohub_configlocal_language.HERE_YOU_CAN_SELECT_YOUR_PREFERRED_LANGU: Here you can select your preferred languages.
infohub_configlocal_language.THIS_IS_USED_TO_TRANSLATE_THE_TEXTS_IN_A: This is used to translate the texts in all plugins to what you prefer.
infohub_configlocal_language.SELECT_A_LANGUAGE_YOU_CAN_SPEAK_AND_CLIC: Select a language you can speak and click on transfer
infohub_configlocal_language.LANGUAGE_CODES_YOU_PREFER._COMMA_SEPARAT: Language codes you prefer. Comma separate them. I prefer: sv,en

infohub_configlocal_zoom.USE_THIS_ZOOM_IF_YOU_HAVE_NO_KEYBOARD_KE: Use this zoom if you have no keyboard
